channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report E-2023110242
item.description:
Report E-2023110242

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On November 2, 2023, two (2) 5-gallon pails of UN1993 were crushed in transit and released approximately ten (10) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Indiana Spill Response (ISR) to remediate the impacted site. ISR personnel collected two (2) damaged 5-gallon pails for disposal. Crews then deployed granular absorbent to the impacted trailer floor, concrete and nearby trench drain and worked them in utilizing hand tools. All UN1993 impacted material was collected and containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum for transport and disposal.
